title: De-radicalizing Extremists From QAnon to Jihad
itunes:title: De-radicalizing Extremists From QAnon to Jihad
description:
David Yaffe-Bellany, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses the group, "Parents for Peace," a nonprofit that specializes in deradicalizing people who are drawn to extremist ideas, from jihad to QAnon.

Joanna Schwartz, a professor at UCLA Law School and an expert in qualified immunity, discusses the Supreme Court siding with police in two cases involving excessive force.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
